citation: Empower Behavioral Health Handbook (2026) – Peer Support section
effects: Sets billing codes and limits for peer support services: code H0038 UC U4 for peer support and H0038 U4 for telephonic peer support; one unit equals 15 minutes; daily maximum 8 units; annual limit 104 units without an extension of benefits; service available for members aged 18 and over and must be delivered by a Certified Peer Support Specialist【818410471609231†L1320-L1333】.
